                               $projPath/alignment/bigwig/${org}/T2_${hist}_normalized.bw \
                               $projPath/alignment/bigwig/${org}/T3_${hist}_normalized.bw \
                               $projPath/alignment/bigwig/${org}/T4_${hist}_normalized.bw \

                               $projPath/alignment/bigwig/${org}/T6_${hist}_normalized.bw \
                              -R $projPath/Homer/mergePeaks/${timeControl}_control/${org}_${hist}_${distance}_q${q}_nomodel_broad_mergedPeakFile.bed \
                              --skipZeros --missingDataAsZero  -o $projPath/heatmap/parameters/${org}/${hist}/${distance}_q${q}_nomodel_broad_cluster_matrix_gene.mat.gz -p 10
for cluster in ${clusterSizes[@]}; do
time plotHeatmap -m $projPath/heatmap/parameters/${org}/${hist}/${distance}_q${q}_cluster_matrix_gene.mat.gz -out $projPath/heatmap/parameters/${org}/${hist}/${distance}_${cluster}_q${q}_Histone_gene.png --kmeans ${cluster} --outFileSortedRegions ${projPath}/clusterInfo/${org}/${hist}/${distance}_${cluster}_q${q}_info.bed

Since our data did not contain E.coli we will be scaling based on reads per genome coverage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d957o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25cd6","text":"Here we are going to be scaling the bigwig files that we will be inputting to create our heatmaps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p4n9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tp3s","text":"*gzsize values can be found in deeptools bamcoverage documentation https://deeptools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/content/feature/effectiveGenomeSize.html","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ljhs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d4so6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"vnir","text":"##== linux command ==##
for org in ${Organism[@]}; do
if [ "${org}" == "human" ]
then
   gsize="2913022398"
else
   gsize="2652783500"
fi
for time in ${Time[@]}; do
for hist in ${histList[@]}; do 
bamCoverage --normalizeUsing RPGC --effectiveGenomeSize ${gsize} -b $projPath/alignment/bam/${org}/${time}/${hist}/sorted.bam -o $projPath/alignment/bigwig/${org}/${time}_${hist}_normalized.bw
done; done; done","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"6870093245204FE68945B4B321C16738"}}}}
